import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API;export const getAllStudents=token=>{return axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/users/students"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export const deleteStudent=(id,token)=>{return axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/users/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export const updateStudent=(id,data,token)=>{return axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/users/").concat(id),data,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};// services/studentService.js
export const getAdminSummary=token=>{return axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/users/admin/summary"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};
